name: No killing while I'm away, please
name_original: No killing while I'm away, please
description:
No killing while I'm away, please

Best experienced with the downloadable version.

This game was  made in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, theme: "Out of Control".

Tutorial
  • WASD to move
  • Click to Shoot
  • Everytime someone shoots, people get teleported arround, that includes you!
  • Keep everyone alive!

Game made by guimm (@guimm12) and Savi (@savidev2)
